content: a classic and cozy ribbed hat that highlights the unique texture of woolstok tweed knit with just one hank this unisex hat makes the perfect gift for everyone experience level * advanced beginner materials * woolstok tweed aran 100% highland wool 100g/109yds 1 hank * size 10 6 0mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge * size 10 6 0mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge * stitch marker * tapestry needle finished measurements * circumference 19 relaxed * height 8 ½ color shown * rolled oats no 3300
